game.name: 2048 Dragon Island
game.description:
This type of unique arcade challenge has the ability to keep you engrossed for hours. We request you to give it at least a single chance to explore the unique world of fun and entertainment. Here in this brand new arcade game, you would meet multiple types of deadly dragons. Your job is to evolve these dangerous souls to the highest possible level by matching 2 or more dragons in 2048 Dragon Island. Join this unique matching challenge to find out what could be inside all of these glowing eggs!

Begin this animal challenge right from the cute dragon eggs and get ready to do your best to come up with the master dragon! Hey! Each successful match will help you to claim for some awesome points. You cannot be bored for a single minute until you complete ten exciting levels of dragon evolution. Put your fingers on your mouse or on the screen of your mobile phone to move multiple dragon pieces in four different directions in this html5 puzzle game!

Use your brain to match two the same stages to prepare one larger stage! There are plenty of stages to deal with and your final objective is to help them to reach the highest stage of the creatures. Try to hold your higher creatures at the bottom of the field while keeping your lower creatures at the top of the screen! Enjoy the wonderful gaming field of 4x4 cells in mobile phones, tablets or PCs! Check out more arcade games online on atmegame.com, no download required!
game.metaTitle: 2048 Dragon Island, Puzzle Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game 2048 Dragon Island at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Puzzle games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE TO CONNECT THE EGGS AND MERGE THEM TO UPGRADE THE DRAGON
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L-CLICK OF MOUSE TO CONNECT THE EGGS AND MERGE THEM TO UPGRADE THE  DRAGON
